column1: Uchi////Uchi is one of my all-time favorite Houston places. I was first introduced to Uchi in Austin
column2: TX. The highly acclaimed brussel sprouts are a must try
column5: with a nice carmelized tang. Although not traditional sushi
column6: the ham and eggs roll is still one of the best items on the menu. We also love the zero sen roll
column8: and walu walu. I recommend the happy hour for the best prices and the short wait. If you love good food
column9: this is a must try restaurant.
